name: Ultimate Chicken Fighter
description:
Ultimate Chicken Fighter was made for the Secret Santa 2021 Game Jam! 

Theme: This is a simple rouge-like Platformer game with optional local multiplayer where you have to clear all the zones from enemies to get into the catacombs. Hope you enjoy!

Music by Stegoratops

Special thanks to Xanashea!

Disclaimer: There are still some major bugs in the game that I'm hoping to fix in the future!
